GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/users.description: serves an array of all usernames

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an article with article_id matching the path parameter

article.author: butter_bridge
article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: updates an article with an incremented or decremented vote count and serves the article

article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
article.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of all the comments for the article of given article_id parameter

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: posts a comment to the article_id of given parameter and serves that article

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: deletes a comment of the given comment_id parameter
